Class SchemeTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.SchemeTokenizer
public class SchemeTokenizer
extends StreamTokenizer

Implements a Scheme reader, not entirely satisfactorily.

Field Detail

readEval

public char readEval
Control the action of the readtime eval macro (#,). Can be 'Y' to allow readtime eval, 'N' to disallow it, or 'W' (for "wrap") to wrap the quoted expression.
Constructor Detail

SchemeTokenizer

SchemeTokenizer

public SchemeTokenizer(String s)
Make a one-shot tokenizer that takes its input from a string.
Method Detail

nextThing

public Object nextThing()                 throws IOException,                        SchemeException
Read and return a Scheme object. Will be called recursively for lists, etc.
